name: userstyles.org - Dark

user.name: johntuley
user.about:
I create some small styles every now and then which tweak only a few things on sites, but eventually I will make a style that applies to an entire site. It's something I've wanted to do for a while, just never got around to it. :P
I have a Donation button although I doubt anyone would ever donate, I haven't made anything worth donating yet. But it's there for the heck of it ...

I might add on to this later. :P
